From: Mohamed BATA <Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Tuesday, July 16, 2024 2:12 PM
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION - SWAROVSKI THE GALLERIA AL MARYAH ISLAND
Importance: High

 

Dear Team,

 

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Swarovski The Galleria Al Maryah Island will be temporarily closed for renovation. The last trading date is 20th August 2024 and hoarding shall be installed after trading hours.

The boutique will tentatively be handed over by 3D after renovation on 14th October and reopening date TBC.

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist has been submitted, and you should have received an email notification.

To update your task status, please scroll down and click "Edit." Then, select the appropriate status from the dropdown box and save the changes.

 

*	Apply for Mall and Police permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Alina Panait <mailto:Alina.Panait@chalhoub.com> 
*	Petty cash & cash float to be utilized in Swarovski Pop Up that shall start trading in the same mall on 21st August 2024 @Alina Panait <mailto:Alina.Panait@chalhoub.com> .

*	Please arrange Cash Collection Service on 21st August and temporarily freeze the service till the reopening @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com> .
